title: Synthetic CT Generation via Variant Invertible Network for All-digital Brain PET Attenuation Correction. (arXiv:2310.01885v1 [eess.IV])
abstract: Attenuation correction (AC) is essential for the generation of artifact-free and quantitatively accurate positron emission tomography (PET) images. However, AC of PET faces challenges including inter-scan motion and erroneous transformation of structural voxel-intensities to PET attenuation-correction factors. Nowadays, the problem of AC for quantitative PET have been solved to a large extent after the commercial availability of devices combining PET with computed tomography (CT). Meanwhile, considering the feasibility of a deep learning approach for PET AC without anatomical imaging, this paper develops a PET AC method, which uses deep learning to generate continuously valued CT images from non-attenuation corrected PET images for AC on brain PET imaging. Specifically, an invertible network combined with the variable augmentation strategy that can achieve the bidirectional inference processes is proposed for synthetic CT generation (IVNAC). translated_title: 通过变体可逆网络生成全数字脑PET衰减校正的合成CT
translated_abstract: 衰减校正（AC）对于生成无伪迹和定量准确的正电子发射断层扫描（PET）图像至关重要。然而，PET的AC面临着挑战，包括扫描间的运动和将结构性体素强度错误转换为PET衰减校正因子。如今，在PET与计算机断层扫描（CT）相结合的设备商业化之后，用于定量PET的AC问题在很大程度上得到了解决。同时，考虑到无解剖成像的深度学习方法用于PET AC的可行性，本文开发了一种PET AC方法，该方法使用深度学习从非衰减校正的PET图像中生成连续值CT图像以进行脑PET成像的AC。具体而言，提出了一种结合变量增强策略的可逆网络，可以实现双向推断过程，用于合成CT生成（IVNAC）。为了评估所提议方法的性能，进行了各种实验证明。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种使用变体可逆网络和变量增强策略结合的深度学习方法，用于从非衰减校正的PET图像生成连续值CT图像，以实现全数字脑PET衰减校正。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a deep learning approach using a variant invertible network and variable augmentation strategy to generate continuous valued CT images from non-attenuation corrected PET images, enabling all-digital brain PET attenuation correction.
